description:
The Rabbits are living peacefully on the slopes of a volcano on the outskirts of Mexico City. That is until the ever-ambitious Rataleone decides to construct a gigantic football stadium and complex for his "Dream Team" right on their territory. Rataleone is oblivious to the fact that he is disrupting the balance of nature. The Volcano does not like being disturbed - the Bamboo Bears must do something before it blows its top!
Source: bcdb.com
